item.title: Fluent Python
item.description:
Notes / Summary

Dives deep into Python’s features and libraries, helping you write more idiomatic and effective Python code. Covers data structures, functions as objects, OOP, control flow, and metaprogramming.

item.title: Atomic Habits
item.description:
Notes / Summary

An excellent guide on building small, consistent habits that lead to significant results. Focuses on identity change and practical strategies.

item.title: Designing Data Intensive Applications
item.description:
Notes / Summary

A foundational book covering the principles and practicalities of data systems. Highly recommended for understanding distributed systems, data storage, and processing.
